overview: A behind the scenes look at the making of the movie Bullitt with a strong focus on the attention to details taken. It features some of the preparations made before shooting began, but is mostly focused on the onsite filming locations which brings a strong amount of reality to the film as the title suggests.
tagline: At 11PM in San Francisco the city beds down. At the international airport a film company moves out...
title: 'Bullitt': Steve McQueen's Commitment to Reality
